metadata.title: CVE-2015-4410 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Moped::BSON::ObjecId.legal? method in rubygem-moped before commitdd5a7c14b5d2e466f7875d079af71ad19774609b allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (worker resource consumption) or perform a cross-sitescripting (XSS) attack via a crafted string.

criterions.comment: ruby-bson: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
